p: The hydrodistillation of the leaves of the eight studied genotypes yielded in yellowish oils with characteristics of citrus odor. The yields of volatiles oils from the leaves of each genotype ranged from 0.29 to 1.03%, as described in Table 1. The highest yield was found in the X6MIA genotype (1.03%), whereas X6M6 genotype disclosed the lowest yield (0.29%).
